author: amaltaro
body:
Main goal was to update the pyopenssl version in order to get two security vulnerabilities fixed, as reported in the WMCore repo:
https://github.com/dmwm/WMCore/network/alert/requirements.txt/pyopenssl/closed

However, several other changes were needed and in short they are:
* updated several other specs, reusing those from the CMSSW 10_4_X branch
* updated build-with-pip to be in sync with the CMSSW branch (rules for py2-* packages installed via pip)
* openssl spec had to be updated to include those 3 cryptograpic algorithms
* python library versions updated as much as possible (including numpy and scipy). Still a bunch to be updated though.

@h4d4 please review and merge when convenient
title: Update pyopenssl to 18.0.0; created spec for all its dependencies
